database.label: Factory Reset
database.helpText: ⚠️ This will completely reset the POS to factory settings. All local data will be deleted and you'll need to enter the connection string again.
database.confirmClear:
⚠️ FACTORY RESET WARNING ⚠️

This will completely reset the POS terminal to factory settings:

• All local orders will be deleted
• All settings will be cleared
• Terminal configuration will be removed
• You will need to enter the connection string again

Are you sure you want to continue?
database.confirmFactoryReset:
⚠️ FINAL CONFIRMATION ⚠️

This is your last chance to cancel.

All data will be permanently deleted and the app will restart.

Click OK to proceed with factory reset.
database.cleared: Successfully cleared {{count}} orders from local database
database.resetSuccess: Factory reset complete. App will restart...
database.clearOperationalHelp: Clears orders, shifts, drawers, payments. Keeps settings.
database.confirmClearOperational:
⚠️ WARNING ⚠️

This will clear ALL operational data:
• All orders
• All staff shifts
• All cash drawer sessions
• All payments and expenses
• All driver earnings

Connection settings and menu data will be preserved.

Are you sure you want to continue?
database.confirmClearOperationalMessage: This action cannot be undone. All operational data will be permanently deleted.
database.confirmClearOperationalCheckbox: I understand that this will delete all orders, shifts, drawers, payments, and driver earnings

factoryResetItem.orders: All local orders will be deleted
factoryResetItem.reconnect: You will need to reconnect with connection string

database.factoryResetWarningMessage: This will completely restore the POS terminal to factory settings.
database.factoryResetFinalMessage: This is your last chance to cancel.
database.factoryResetFinalWarning: All data will be permanently deleted and the app will restart.
database.factoryResetCheckbox: I understand that all data will be permanently deleted and the app will restart
